title: BRIEF-Firstenergy Announces Appointment Of Sandra Pianalto To Board
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Firstenergy Corp:
* FIRSTENERGY - APPOINTMENT OF SANDRA PIANALTO TO BOARD; INCREASING SIZE OF BOARD FROM 13 TO 14 MEMBERS - SEC FILING​
* FIRSTENERGY CORP - ‍BOARD TOOK ACTION TO TERMINATE EXECUTIVE SHORT-TERM INCENTIVE PROGRAM, INCLUDING FOR 2017​
* FIRSTENERGY-‍FOR 2018, SUBSEQUENT YRS, EXPECTED THAT SENIOR OFFICERS WILL PARTICIPATE IN ANNUAL CASH INCENTIVE PLAN THAT APPLIES TO OTHER EMPLOYEES​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2EIlH0U ) Further company coverage:
